name: Bouncing Spinner
description:
Most relaxing spinner is here!

Help the Spinner to bounce out the problems in Bouncing Spinner.
The game is very annoying and simple go try it, all you need to do is collect coins and avoid the obstacles, but it won't be an easy job trust me.
Bouncing Spinner is one of the games that you fall in love it after playing your first game.

HOW TO PLAY:
Click or touch on mobile devices to change direction of rabbit. Avoid the collisions and collect coins to score and save high score to leaderboard to challenge others people in the worlds.
